Package com.mygdx.game.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BatBody
    BatBody is a class that contains the information about with the physics body of the Bat Enemy.
    BubbleBody
    BubbleBody is a class that contains the information about with the physics body of the Bubble Enemy.
    BulletBody
    BulletBody is a class that contains the information about with the physics body of the bullets.
    ElementBody
    ElementBody is class that creates keeps information about the body and fixtures of the entity. it has the methods to create the fixtures of the body and defines it's type and position.
    GameController
    GameController class controls everything related to the physics of the game.
    HeroBody
    HeroBody is a class that contains the information about with the physics body of the Hero.
    MapTileBody
    MapTileBody is a class that contains the information about with the physics body of the MapTile.
    SnailBody
    SnailBody is a class that contains the information about with the physics body of the Snail Enemy.
